Experience Senior QA Engineer Yahoo May 2015  – Present (4 months) Senior Software QA Engineer if(we) October 2014  – Present (11 months) Test automation, Test automation framework development, Testing tools development, CI test server development and maintains. Software QA Engineer eBay Inc November 2012  –  September 2014  (1 year 11 months) Timonium, MD, USA •	Responsible for the QA of the PayPal BillMeLater AuthEngine. Use groovy, spock and soapUI to do Integration test, end to end test, functionality test, regression test and smoke test for new features and changes in Java developed SOAP and RESTful WebService. 
•	Accomplish sprint task of the DEV team and contribute to the CI build and Regression Test of the QA team. 
•	Responsible for updating and maintaining the core testing API project “WhiteShark” which is our fundamental testing Library writing in groovy as a maven project. 
•	Design service layer testing API with QAs, implement Bamboo/Jenkins CI build for nightly build and smoke test after each push. 
•	Develop Web Service client in “WhiteShark” with factory design pattern. 
•	Deploy web service application on glassfish on local machine and testing against local. 
•	Request QA environments push to release management team and verify push successful by running smoke test. 
•	Coordinate with developers on SVN/git brunching, build and deploy on team server for testing. 
•	Being a member of team that apply agile methodology, participate in scrum daily stand up, scoring, planning, review and retrospective. 
•	Build connection to database using pain JDBC connection and DAOs, reversal engine Hibernate model object and DAOs used for testing. 
•	Work with DBDs DEVs on solving any exceptions or issue after push to QA and DEV environments. Java Developer eTeam May 2012  –  October 2012  (6 months) South Plainfield, NJ, USA •	Development web service using Java Technologies: Spring framework, Hibernate, JMS, EJB, JAXB, JTA, JPA. 
•	Pair programming with senior java developers and complete sprint stories. 
•	Write and wired up processers in business logic flow, update Spring configure class or xml file. 
•	Create data model and DAO layer with Hibernate, configure hibernate mapping file with one-to-one, one-to-many and many-to-many relationship. 
•	Create Web Service end point and writing marshaller and unmarshaller. 
•	Associate with DBDs to update DAOs with data model changes. 
•	Update and create database push script with PL/SQL. Web Developer CulturePlay LLC October 2011  –  May 2012  (8 months) Brooklyn, NY, USA •	Front end development, with JSP and MVC 
•	Use Dreamweaver, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JQuery to do web page development. 
•	Developing web game for children education. 
•	Communicate with tech lead weekly to report progress and sync business requirements.
